data.message: Coca-Cola why don't you give people money back for each plastic bottle they recycle?

replies.message: Hi Benjamin, we’re committed to supporting any well-designed initiative that could improve recovering and recycling rates, including a deposit return scheme. Ultimately that decision must be led by Government but requiring many organisations, – public and private – to work in partnership.
Maybe you will lobby for this Coca-Cola

Yes and the government has nothing to do with it. If Coca-Cola wanted a deposit scheme they would operate it privately. The bottles would be stamped like they are in Finland and Estonia and Coca-Cola would buy the stamped bottles back.
